Package javax.swing.plaf.synth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SynthConstants
    Constants used by Synth.
    SynthUI
    SynthUI is used to fetch the SynthContext for a particular Component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorType
    A typesafe enumeration of colors that can be fetched from a style.
    DefaultSynthStyleFactory
    Factory used for obtaining styles.
    ImagePainter
    ImagePainter fills in the specified region using an Image.
    ParsedSynthStyle
    ParsedSynthStyle are the SynthStyle's that SynthParser creates.
    ParsedSynthStyle.AggregatePainter  
    ParsedSynthStyle.DelegatingPainter  
    ParsedSynthStyle.PainterInfo  
    ParsedSynthStyle.StateInfo  
    Region
    A distinct rendering area of a Swing component.
    SynthArrowButton
    JButton object that draws a scaled Arrow in one of the cardinal directions.
    SynthArrowButton.SynthArrowButtonUI  
    SynthBorder
    SynthBorder is a border that delegates to a Painter.
    SynthButtonUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JButton.
    SynthCheckBoxMenuItemUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JCheckBoxMenuItem.
    SynthCheckBoxUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JCheckBox.
    SynthColorChooserUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JColorChooser.
    SynthComboBoxUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JComboBox.
    SynthComboBoxUI.EditorFocusHandler
    Handler for repainting combo when editor component gains/looses focus
    SynthComboBoxUI.SynthComboBoxEditor  
    SynthComboPopup
    Synth's ComboPopup.
    SynthContext
    An immutable transient object containing contextual information about a Region.
    SynthDefaultLookup
    SynthDefaultLookup redirects all lookup calls to the SynthContext.
    SynthDesktopIconUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for a minimized internal frame on a desktop.
    SynthDesktopPaneUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JDesktopPane.
    SynthDesktopPaneUI.TaskBar  
    SynthEditorPaneUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JEditorPane.
    SynthFormattedTextFieldUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JFormattedTextField.
    SynthGraphicsUtils
    Wrapper for primitive graphics calls.
    SynthGraphicsUtils.SynthIconWrapper
    Wraps a SynthIcon around the Icon interface, forwarding calls to the SynthIcon with a given SynthContext.
    SynthInternalFrameTitlePane
    The class that manages a synth title bar
    SynthInternalFrameTitlePane.JPopupMenuUIResource  
    SynthInternalFrameUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JInternalFrame.
    SynthLabelUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JLabel.
    SynthListUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JList.
    SynthLookAndFeel
    SynthLookAndFeel provides the basis for creating a customized look and feel.
    SynthLookAndFeel.AATextListener  
    SynthMenuBarUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JMenuBar.
    SynthMenuItemLayoutHelper
    Calculates preferred size and layouts synth menu items.
    SynthMenuItemUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JMenuItem.
    SynthMenuLayout  
    SynthMenuUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JMenu.
    SynthOptionPaneUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JOptionPane.
    SynthPainter
    SynthPainter is used for painting portions of JComponents.
    SynthPanelUI
    Provides the Synth L&F UI delegate for JPanel.
    SynthParser  
    SynthParser.LazyImageIcon
    ImageIcon that lazily loads the image until needed.

    Synth's SplitPaneDivider.
    SynthSplitPaneUI

    SynthStyle
    SynthStyle is a set of style properties.
